item.title: 安全初创公司Torq以12亿美元估值完成融资
item.description: 以色列网络安全初创公司Torq计划于周日宣布完成1.4亿美元融资，公司估值由此升至12亿美元。【原文：The Israeli cybersecurity startup Torq is planning to announce Sunday that it has closed a $140 million funding round, raising its valuation to $1.2 billion.】

item.title: 乌克兰袭击里海俄罗斯石油钻井平台
item.description: 乌克兰于夜间袭击了俄罗斯石油巨头卢克石油公司在里海拥有的三座钻井平台，此举旨在削弱俄罗斯为战争提供资金的经济能力。【原文：Ukraine overnight targeted three drilling platforms in the Caspian Sea owned by Russian oil major Lukoil in the latest move to weaken Russia’s economic capacity to fund its war effort.】

item.title: 特朗普公司加紧布局沙特地产，沙特王储开放市场
item.description: 特朗普集团与奢侈地产开发商达尔环球公司正启动在沙特阿拉伯价值100亿美元的房地产项目销售，旨在借势即将出台的新规——该政策将放宽外资投资限制。【原文：The Trump Organization and luxury developer Dar Global Plc are kicking off sales at real estate projects in Saudi Arabia valued at $10 billion, seeking to capitalize on new rules that will soon make it easier for foreigners to invest.】

item.title: 沃尔玛携手谷歌母公司Alphabet，在Gemini平台推出人工智能辅助购物服务
item.description: 沃尔玛公司正与谷歌母公司Alphabet合作，在谷歌Gemini平台上推出人工智能增强型购物服务——这是该零售商竞相将该技术应用于其整个运营体系的一部分。【原文：Walmart Inc. is partnering with Alphabet Inc. to offer AI-enhanced shopping on Google’s Gemini platform — part of the retailer’s race to apply the technology across its operations.】

item.title: “雄鹰队长”惨败事件为风险管理敲响警钟
item.description: 圣诞节期间让一位成功的期权交易员破产的，并非什么"只活一次"的冲动交易，而是一种流传数百年的赌博策略——这种策略在业余二十一点玩家中颇受欢迎。【原文：It wasn’t some YOLO trade that took down a successful options trader over Christmas, but a centuries-old gambling strategy popular with amateur blackjack players.】

item.title: 七大巨头的股市霸权显露裂痕
item.description: 近年来，为战胜市场，许多投资者采取了一种简单策略：大量买入美国最大科技股。【原文：To beat the market in recent years, many investors applied a simple strategy: Load up on the biggest US technology stocks.】

item.title: 马斯克旗下Grok AI因涉及色情图像在印尼、马来西亚遭封禁
item.description: 印度尼西亚和马来西亚上周末限制了对埃隆·马斯克旗下Grok人工智能系统的访问，成为首个因该系统生成色情内容而禁止使用该人工智能系统的国家。【原文：Indonesia and Malaysia restricted access to Elon Musk’s Grok AI over the weekend, becoming the first countries to ban the artificial intelligence system over its generation of sexual content.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉债务激增令新兴市场困境债务投资机会寥寥
item.description: 委内瑞拉领导人尼古拉斯·马杜罗的下台引发该国债券市场大幅上涨，使得新兴市场债务中本已日渐萎缩的深度困境投资机会进一步缩小。【原文：The ouster of Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro drove an outsize rally in the country’s bonds, making the already shrinking universe of deep-distress opportunities in emerging-market debt even smaller.】

item.title: 泰国改革党承诺在选举临近之际重振"第五只经济猛虎"
item.description: 人民党——其前身政党曾赢得泰国上次大选——承诺组建“变革政府”，并提出一系列重大改革方案以振兴该国疲软的经济。【原文：The People’s Party, whose predecessor won Thailand’s last election, pledged to form a “government of change” as it set out sweeping reforms and plans to remedy the country’s ailing economy.】

item.title: 伊拉克将2月巴斯拉中质原油对亚洲的折扣降至每桶1.30美元
item.description: 伊拉克2月下调了面向亚洲客户的巴士拉中质原油价格，此前沙特阿拉伯也采取了类似举措，降低了其旗舰原油在最大市场的售价。【原文：Iraq cut the pricing of its Basrah Medium crude for Asian customers in February, following a similar move by Saudi Arabia to lower the cost of its flagship oil to buyers in the biggest market.】

item.title: 德国部长：愿采取"联合行动"保障供应链安全
item.description: 德国副总理兼财政部长拉斯·克林格贝尔在启程前往美国进行为期两天的访问前表示，德国愿意与国际伙伴采取"联合行动"，以加强供应链建设，确保获得制造业所需的关键材料。【原文：Germany is open to taking “joint action” with international partners to bolster supply chains and ensure access to materials critical to manufacturing, Vice Chancellor and Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil said before departing for a two-day visit to the US.】

item.title: 刚果中央银行将出手干预以遏制货币投机行为
item.description: 刚果民主共和国中央银行表示，计划继续干预外汇市场以遏制货币投机行为。【原文：The central bank of the Democratic Republic of Congo said it plans to continue intervening in the foreign exchange market to curb currency speculation.】

item.title: 格雷格斯测试英国人对香肠卷的胃口极限
item.description: 格雷格斯公司的香肠卷被印在袜子和T恤上广受追捧，遍布英国的数千家门店使其成为最不可错过的烘焙店。但这家上市公司的扩张正显露疲态，投资者纷纷押注其股价下跌。【原文：Its sausage rolls are idolized on socks and T-shirts, and its thousands of shops make it Britain’s most unmissable baker. But Greggs Plc is showing the strain of expansion, and investors are piling up bets against it.】

item.title: 德国股东要求获得追加投资的权利
item.description: 在德国，一些在濒临破产的公司上血本无归的小投资者抱怨称，他们被禁止向这些倒闭企业追加投资。【原文：In Germany, some small investors who lost everything on companies on the verge of insolvency are complaining that they haven’t been allowed to put more money into the collapsed businesses.】

item.title: 中国将加强法律框架建设，完善出口管制
item.description: 中国商务部表示，今年的工作重点包括完善法律框架、加强出口管制、强化风险防范，以保障供应链韧性和国家安全。【原文：China’s commerce ministry said its key priorities this year include strengthening legal frameworks, improving export controls and enhancing risk prevention to safeguard supply chain resilience and national security.】

item.title: 中国推出中空低价货运飞机：央视报道
item.description: 据中国中央电视台周日报道，中国已完成天马-1000无人货运飞机的首次试飞。该机型具备后勤保障和应急响应能力。【原文：China has completed the maiden flight of the Tianma-1000, an unmanned cargo aircraft capable of logistics and emergency responses, China Central Television reported Sunday.】

item.title: 日本执政联盟伙伴视提前选举为"新阶段"
item.description: 随着日本首相高市早苗执政联盟中某党派领袖提及"进入新阶段"，外界对其将宣布提前大选的猜测持续升温。【原文：Speculation that Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi will call for a snap election continues to rise as the leader of a partner in her party’s coalition cited a shift to “a new stage.”】

item.title: 全球人工智能竞赛中亚洲领跑，2026年股市开局强劲
item.description: 亚洲科技股在2026年开局表现强劲，投资者押注其增长势头和相对于美国同行的优异表现将持续全年。【原文：Asia’s technology stocks began 2026 on a tear, with investors betting their momentum and outperformance against US peers will last through the year.】

item.title: 泰国前总理他信的侄子面临赢得选民支持的平衡术
item.description: 为竞选总理而参选的为泰党领军人物翁萨瓦，在执掌这个东南亚国家的过程中面临微妙的平衡——他既要借助家族政治遗产赢得党内支持者的拥护，又需展现振兴经济的创新理念。【原文：Yodchanan Wongsawat, the Pheu Thai Party’s top candidate for prime minister, faces a delicate balancing act in his quest to run the Southeast Asian country — he must leverage his family’s legacy to win the support of the party faithful, while showing he has fresh ideas to revitalize the economy.】

item.title: 贝森特向路透社透露，美国可能很快解除部分对委内瑞拉的制裁
item.description: 路透社援引美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特接受采访时的话报道称，美国最早可能在下周解除对委内瑞拉的额外制裁，以促进石油销售。【原文：The US may lift additional sanctions on Venezuela as early as next week to facilitate oil sales, Reuters reported, citing an interview with Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent.】

item.title: 美国通胀率将在11月CPI数据混乱后回升
item.description: 随着2025年接近尾声，美国消费者可能仅感受到通胀的温和回升，这与价格压力正在逐步缓解的态势相符。【原文：US consumers probably experienced only a modest pickup in inflation as 2025 drew to a close, consistent with price pressures that are gradually abating.】

item.title: 更多债券濒临垃圾级边缘：《信用周刊》
item.description: 在美国公司债券市场平静的表面之下，存在着令人担忧的迹象，表明一些公司可能失去其投资级评级。【原文：Beneath the calm surface of the US corporate bond market, there are worrying signs about companies that could lose their investment-grade status.】

item.title: 埃隆·马斯克称X将在七天内开源其算法
item.description: 社交媒体平台X将在七天内向公众开放其新算法，埃隆·马斯克周六表示，这包括用于决定向用户推荐哪些帖子和广告的代码。【原文：Social media platform X will open its new algorithm to the public in seven days, Elon Musk said on Saturday, including the code used to decide what posts and advertisements are recommended to users.】

item.title: 英伟达与特斯拉通过不同路径追逐同一自动驾驶目标
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋本周在拉斯维加斯消费电子展上登台亮相，为该公司的自动驾驶技术进行了迄今为止最清晰的推介。这位首席执行官对自动驾驶汽车的愿景，正逐步向特斯拉公司及其首席执行官埃隆·马斯克等主要客户的领域进发。【原文：Jensen Huang took the stage at the CES trade show in Las Vegas this week to make the clearest pitch yet for Nvidia Corp.’s autonomous driving technology. In doing so, the chief executive officer’s vision for vehicles that can drive themselves edged into the terrain of major customers like Tesla Inc. and its boss, Elon Musk.】

item.title: 马斯克称英国为"法西斯国家"，X平台Grok人工智能图像争议升级
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克指责英国政府是"法西斯主义者"，此前英国政府因其人工智能工具Grok生成涉及妇女和儿童的色情图像而加强了封禁X平台的威胁。【原文：Elon Musk accused the UK government of being “fascist” after it stepped up threats to block X over sexualized images of women and children produced by his artificial intelligence tool Grok.】

item.title: 马杜罗的法律团队在被捕一周后仍悬而未决
item.description: 当世界正被美国逮捕委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗引发的地缘政治影响所占据时，一场关于谁将代表这位被罢免的领导人出席其在纽约的刑事案件的斗争正在上演。【原文：While the world has been consumed by the geopolitical ramifications of the US capture of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, a struggle is playing out over who will represent the ousted leader in his criminal case in New York.】

item.title: 马杜罗下台化解石油资源丰富的圭亚那边境冲突风险
item.description: 圭亚那——这个拥有数十年间全球最大石油发现的国家，似乎已成为美国总统唐纳德·特朗普驱逐委内瑞拉强人尼古拉斯·马杜罗的早期受益者。【原文：Guyana, home to the world’s biggest oil discovery in decades, appears to be an early beneficiary of US President Donald Trump’s ouster of Venezuelan strongman Nicolas Maduro.】

item.title: 中国人工智能领军企业警告：与美国差距扩大，此前刚经历10亿美元IPO周
item.description: 中国生成式人工智能领域多位顶尖专家警告称，这个亚洲大国短期内不太可能在全球人工智能竞赛中超越美国。【原文：Some of China’s most prominent figures in generative artificial intelligence warned that the Asian nation is unlikely to eclipse the US in the global AI race anytime soon.】

item.title: 特朗普接管石油产业之际：委内瑞拉交易者指南
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普总统承诺，其对委内瑞拉石油产业的敌意收购将吸引美国能源公司数十亿美元投资，并使这个南美国家的民众致富。【原文：President Donald Trump promises his hostile takeover of Venezuela’s oil industry will inspire billions of dollars of investment from American energy companies, and it will make the people of the South American nation rich.】

item.title: 大宗商品主宰一切，从石油到农作物
item.description: 理查德·哈斯称，特朗普在委内瑞拉的行动背后存在单一动机【原文：One Thing Motivates Trump’s Actions in Venezuela, Richard Haass Says】
